description: Welcome to Gateway Homes in the heart of Burnaby. This 3 bedroom and 2.5 bathroom End Unit has 1194 sqft of living space comes with TWO parking stalls and 1 locker and 1 bike locker. The layout is functional with no wasted space, featuring S/S appliances, laminate flooring, quartz countertop. Upstairs features a unique layout with 2 bedroom on the second floor, and the master bedroom on the third floor, and huge rooftop patio for your entertainment. Close to amenities including transit/Edmonds SkyTrain, shopping, great restaurants, parks, public library, Edmonds Community Centre & Robert Burnaby Outdoor Pool. EV Charge available.
